title: Don't even bother playing ADC
body: Doesn't matter if you're going 10/1 at one point with most of your items (PD, IE, LW, and BT + vamp sceptre) because the Frozen Heart/Righteous Glory Maokai will deal 50% of your HP alone while you barely dent him and Azir will proceed to fucking 2 shot you from 1000 range away.
